alert.note: Alert for Northern Spartanburg; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 5:08PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL SPARTANBURG COUNTY THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spartanburg, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spartanburg, Roebuck, USC Upstate, Cedar Springs, Wellford, Boiling Springs SC, and Moore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
